{"kind":"Build","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"solver-f26-job-2","namespace":"thoth-test-core","selfLink":"/apis/build.openshift.io/v1/namespaces/thoth-test-core/builds/solver-f26-job-2","uid":"e73d0cf3-4a12-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","resourceVersion":"35246158","creationTimestamp":"2018-04-27T12:02:48Z","labels":{"app":"thoth-core","buildconfig":"solver-f26-job","component":"solver","openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f26-job","openshift.io/build.start-policy":"Serial","template":"solver-buildconfig","thoth":"0.1.0"},"annotations":{"openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f26-job","openshift.io/build.number":"2"},"ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"build.openshift.io/v1","kind":"BuildConfig","name":"solver-f26-job","uid":"f0b23cf0-4a04-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","controller":true}]},"spec":{"serviceAccount":"builder","source":{"type":"Git","dockerfile":"FROM fedora:26
CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

WORKDIR /home/solver
USER solver

{"kind":"Build","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"solver-f27-job-1","namespace":"thoth-test-core","selfLink":"/apis/build.openshift.io/v1/namespaces/thoth-test-core/builds/solver-f27-job-1","uid":"7b3b2805-4a03-11e8-837a-fa163e151577","resourceVersion":"35177142","creationTimestamp":"2018-04-27T10:12:24Z","labels":{"build":"solver-f27-job","buildconfig":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.start-policy":"Serial"},"annotations":{"openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.number":"1"},"ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"build.openshift.io/v1","kind":"BuildConfig","name":"solver-f27-job","uid":"7b36215f-4a03-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","controller":true}]},"spec":{"serviceAccount":"builder","source":{"type":"Git","dockerfile":"FROM fedora:27
CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

WORKDIR /home/solver
USER solver

ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself

RUN \

 chmod 777 /home/solver

CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

{"kind":"Build","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"solver-f27-job-6","namespace":"thoth-test-core","selfLink":"/apis/build.openshift.io/v1/namespaces/thoth-test-core/builds/solver-f27-job-6","uid":"93224d71-5cfd-11e8-b993-fa163ef20471","resourceVersion":"57033775","creationTimestamp":"2018-05-21T13:47:59Z","labels":{"app":"thoth-core","build":"solver-f27-job","buildconfig":"solver-f27-job","component":"solver","openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.start-policy":"Serial","template":"solver-buildconfig","thoth":"0.1.0"},"annotations":{"openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.number":"6"},"ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"build.openshift.io/v1","kind":"BuildConfig","name":"solver-f27-job","uid":"7b36215f-4a03-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","controller":true}]},"spec":{"serviceAccount":"builder","source":{"type":"Git","dockerfile":"FROM fedora:27
CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

WORKDIR /home/solver
USER solver

{"kind":"Build","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"solver-f27-job-7","namespace":"thoth-test-core","selfLink":"/apis/build.openshift.io/v1/namespaces/thoth-test-core/builds/solver-f27-job-7","uid":"c8414474-5cfd-11e8-b993-fa163ef20471","resourceVersion":"57034876","creationTimestamp":"2018-05-21T13:49:29Z","labels":{"app":"thoth-core","build":"solver-f27-job","buildconfig":"solver-f27-job","component":"solver","openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.start-policy":"Serial","template":"solver-buildconfig","thoth":"0.1.0"},"annotations":{"openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.number":"7"},"ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"build.openshift.io/v1","kind":"BuildConfig","name":"solver-f27-job","uid":"7b36215f-4a03-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","controller":true}]},"spec":{"serviceAccount":"builder","source":{"type":"Git","dockerfile":"FROM fedora:27
CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

WORKDIR /home/solver
USER solver

{"kind":"Build","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{"name":"solver-f27-job-8","namespace":"thoth-test-core","selfLink":"/apis/build.openshift.io/v1/namespaces/thoth-test-core/builds/solver-f27-job-8","uid":"ca87f0f1-5cfd-11e8-b993-fa163ef20471","resourceVersion":"57034910","creationTimestamp":"2018-05-21T13:49:32Z","labels":{"app":"thoth-core","build":"solver-f27-job","buildconfig":"solver-f27-job","component":"solver","openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.start-policy":"Serial","template":"solver-buildconfig","thoth":"0.1.0"},"annotations":{"openshift.io/build-config.name":"solver-f27-job","openshift.io/build.number":"8"},"ownerReferences":[{"apiVersion":"build.openshift.io/v1","kind":"BuildConfig","name":"solver-f27-job","uid":"7b36215f-4a03-11e8-b133-fa163ef20471","controller":true}]},"spec":{"serviceAccount":"builder","source":{"type":"Git","dockerfile":"FROM fedora:27
CMD ["pypi"]
ENTRYPOINT ["thoth-solver"]
ENV \
 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \
 THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR='/tmp/thoth-solver-install'

RUN \
 useradd -m solver &&\
 dnf update -y &&\
 mkdir -p ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}

# Install thoth-solver itself
COPY ./ ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR}
RUN \
 cd ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 pip3 install . &&\
 cd / &&\
 rm -rf ${THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR} &&\
 unset THOTH_SOLVER_TMP_DIR &&\
 dnf clean all &&\
 chmod 777 /home/solver

WORKDIR /home/solver
USER solver
